channel.title: I need that very simple compiler!

item.title: I need that very simple compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Mightylizard Mightylizard
item.description:
@Mightylizard wrote:

Here If You Dont Wanna Use His

@echo off title Bloody Compiler color 2a echo Now Compiling "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java echo Finished Compiling echo Made by Bloody pause

Read full topic
item.source: I need that very simple compiler!

item.title: I need that very simple compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.source: I need that very simple compiler!

item.title: I need that very simple compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Here il just give you the variables for system and owner for JDK 6.7.

Under User variables make the title CLASSPATH and put this in the value,

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Then under System Variables make the title PATH and for the value,

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;

Now you are done with the environment variables!
Note: If you have another version of jdk, for the part that says _07 in both classpath and path, change it to your jdk.

Read full topic
